manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Join the Viking Revolution Our team is whole heartedly committed to making sure that each product we offer is of the highest quality, using only premium ingredients and materials. Grow and care for your beard or mustache with our grooming products in complete confidence. Our results speak for themselves and we back all our beard care treatments and accessories.

The Viking Experience Beard care is a passionate affair. Whatever the style, color, length or shape of your facial hair, we take looking after it very seriously, because your beard is going to make a statement, so make it a good one! In just 1 year, what started out as a hobby between two bearded friends frustrated by the limited and uninspiring Beard Care industry became the go-to brand for Men’s Grooming. If you’re a modern man with high standards and an awesome beard - go ahead, join the unique experience that is the Viking Revolution and see what we are all about. The Viking Quality You deserve the best, and so does your beard. The entire Viking Revolution team is wholeheartedly committed to making sure that each and every product we offer is of the highest quality, using only premium ingredients and materials. We also supply our products in man-size quantities, so they won’t run out before you’re ready. Our scents are carefully curated to keep them fresh and masculine without being overwhelming, and wherever possible we use natural formulations and avoid including harsh, unnecessary chemicals that aren’t kind to your skin or the planet. The Viking Promise Grow and care for your beard in complete confidence. We are completely sure that you will love every one of our products, but if for any reason you’re not happy with any item from our beard care range, just let us know and we will fix it. We are proud that our results speak for themselves, and that once you have experienced the feel of a Viking Revolution beard, you’ll never go back. If you’re ready to up your grooming game, try the latest men’s beard care products and find out why we have taken the industry by storm!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lathers well, fresh scent, not overpowering
reviews.reviewText: Lathers well, fresh scent, not overpowering, just the right amount. I simply prefer a shaving soap that does its' job by lathering up well, providing a smooth base for the razor to glide over. I do not want a strong lingering scent in a shave soap. This brand provides all of what I am looking for in a shave soap!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good shaving cream
reviews.reviewText: Great consistency,I use this on a daily basis for my head and face. It is a good value for the money but it’s a good glide with the razor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent product, good for the price, but very weak scent
reviews.reviewText: Definitely an above-average shave cream. Considering the price its a very good purchase. My only gripe, and its a big one, is that the scent in all three is extremely weak. In addition to being weak, the Sandalwood scent bears no resemblance to sandalwood. The other two scents are more accurate, but they're all extremely weak. They should spend an extra 15 cents on each container for more scented oil. Add a dollar to the price for three containers and everybody wins.Shaving is a chore. I buy products to make the chore more fun and enjoyable. Without a great scent, shaving is just a chore with this cream. Will not buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Ordered the three pack to sample their brand. When I received it only one was full and the other two looked like someone had already used them. The product seems good, but I am leery to order more if this is normal quality control. Viking did resolve the problem to my satisfaction and the product is of good quality as I stated above.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Did not expect it to be that GOOD...
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical about this 3-pack product. Usually this is how low quality items sold to attract buyers -- but this really is one of those rare exceptions. I tried sandalwood. Nice. The cream is smooth and it has a perfect density for applying on wet skin. The scent is nice, mild... It washes off nicely, without leaving any coating on skin, which also means you don't have to wash off razors thoroughly to get it off. The value is great. Those 3.5 oz shall last. However, it is still a risk to blind buy since all skin types are different. For me it's 5 out of 5. I tried many brands in the past "Gentlemen's Refinery", "Harry's", Di Parma (unscented), etc. This product is on the level.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get pack, super value

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Better than the traditional mug & brush
reviews.reviewText: As a mug & brush user for over sixty years, I've read of shavers who rubbed the shaving soap on their beards and then used the brush to build lather. It never appealed to me. Now, however, with this shaving cream, it works.You can't whip up a lather in the container. Instead, I wet my beard then use the wet brush to distribute the shaving cream all over my beard. I constantly add water to the brush to build a very good lather.More important, my 1972 Persona dual-blade razor works very comfortably with the lather for a close, irritation-free shave. My skin feels moister and, adding the Viking after-shave balm to my face completes the comfort. (I've stayed with the twin blade after reading and experiencing that the first blade sets up the whiskers and the second one cuts. Additional blades do nothing more than scrape the already whisker-free skin.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great shave
reviews.reviewText: Always read about shave creams that you get that gives a great shave. This is the one!!! It's a little more than most but well worth it. I used to much the first time. But it feels great and shaves great.
